positive_examples: This is an example of ionic conductor.
The ionic conductor demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed ionic conductor in this context.
A typical case of ionic conductor would involve these features.
The concept of ionic conductor applies here.
A substance that conducts electricity through the movement of ions rather than electrons.
negative_examples: This is an example of electrolyte, not ionic conductor.
This represents conductor substance in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Electrolyte, or other types of ConductorSubstance

definition: A material that conducts electricity through the movement of ions rather than electrons.
